category: Key Item / Move (Obsolete in Modern Competitive)
summary: Teaches the move Strength, which is a base 80 power Physical Normal-type move. In competitive formats, it is not used as an item; the move itself is outclassed by other Normal-type attacks like Return, Frustration (in past gens), or Body Slam.
typical_users: Not used in competitive battles. Historically, in-game Pokémon that learned Strength for field navigation might have carried it temporarily, but it has no competitive viability.
